{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88","id":2891934753,"node_id":"PR_kwDOOcuOYs6sX2wh","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88","diff_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/88","number":88,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"Feat/editable feed urls","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"## Description\r\nThis PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.\r\n\r\n## Changes Made\r\n- **Backend**: Added PUT endpoint `/api/feeds/<feed_id>` for updating feed URLs with validation\r\n- **Frontend**: \r\n  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget\r\n  - Created modal dialog for editing feed URLs with form validation\r\n  - Implemented JavaScript functionality for the edit workflow\r\n  - Added CSS styling for edit button and modal\r\n- **Infrastructure**:\r\n  - Configured CORS for frontend-backend communication\r\n  - Fixed backend import issues and function naming conflicts\r\n  - Ensured consistent relative imports throughout the backend\r\n- **Testing**: All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)\r\n- **Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\r\n\r\n## Features\r\n- Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget\r\n- Modal dialog opens with current feed URL and name\r\n- Form validation ensures valid URLs before submission\r\n  - Feed content is automatically refreshed after URL update\r\n- Error handling for invalid URLs or network issues\r\n\r\n## Testing\r\nThe functionality has been thoroughly tested:\r\n- Backend API endpoints respond correctly\r\n- Frontend UI works seamlessly with backend\r\n- Edit workflow successfully updates feed URLs\r\n- CORS configuration allows frontend-backend communication\r\n\r\n## Code Review Feedback Addressed\r\n- Fixed inconsistent imports by reverting to relative imports throughout the backend\r\n- Resolved performance issues by limiting feed items in PUT responses\r\n\r\n## Related Issues\r\nImplements the feature requested to make feed URLs editable.","created_at":"2025-10-06T21:19:46Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T21:22:22Z","closed_at":null,"merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"2b12f9504ef03c75f6e2d3d365ccff03397ace3c","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/88/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls","sha":"c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy

**Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\r\n\r\n## Features\r\n- Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget\r\n- Modal dialog opens with current feed URL and name\r\n- Form
